title: BBC Britains Treasure Islands Series 1 1of3 Ocean Odyssey 720p x
description:
Britains Treasure Islands: Series 1

History, Travel Documentary hosted by Stewart McPherson, published by BBC in 2016 - English narration 
http://docuwiki.net/images/3/37/Britains-Treasure-Islands-Series-1-Cover.jpg

Information
------------------------------

Britain's Treasure Islands: Series 1
Naturalist Stewart McPherson travels to all the UK Overseas Territories, exploring their wildlife, landscapes, history and people
Stewart McPherson, writer, explorer, and naturalist, sets out to follow his childhood dream - to be the first person to set foot on every one of Britain's overseas Territories.
We follow him on a journey which will take him across all Seven Seas, allow him to study some of the most pristine nature reserves on the planet, and one which will see him cross paths with conservationists, "Saints", survivors of volcanic eruptions, and the descendants of infamous mutineers. Along the way, we consider the precarious situation of many of these territories - sometimes politically, sometimes environmentally - and the challenges faced by those trying to protect them


1)  Ocean Odyssey 
Naturalist Stewart McPherson's exploration of the UK Overseas Territories begins in Bermuda, in the north Atlantic, where he finds ancient castles and a bird that had been thought extinct for more than 300 years. Stewart then travels to the British Indian Ocean Territory, which lies halfway between Tanzania and Indonesia, where he comes across the world's biggest land invertebrate. He eventually reaches Pitcairn Island, in the southern Pacific, where he meets the descendants of the mutineers of the Bounty.
